text: Kare-ra ga issho demo, shikkari to bobi shita mura toka boheki no indenai kagiri wa tatakawanaidearou. Tsuyoi no wa kare-ra no ma no toso kokoro (dakedearu). Anata wa kare-ra ga danketsu shite iru to omoudearouga, sono kokoro wa barabaradearu. Kore wa kare-ra ga, chisei no nai min no tamedearu
